ADG.caption: Wallet 1
ADG.doc: The wallet address of the first recipient in this splitter.
ADG.name: wallet_1

ADH.caption: Wallet 2
ADH.doc: The wallet address of the second recipient in this splitter.
ADH.name: wallet_2

ADI.caption: Percentage 1
ADI.doc: The percentage of the splitter wallet 1 will receive, this is in basis points 1% is equal to 100 basis points.
ADI.name: percentage_1

ADJ.caption: Percentage 2
ADJ.doc: The percentage of the splitter wallet 2 will receive, this is in basis points 1% is equal to 100 basis points.
ADJ.name: percentage_2

ADS.caption: Name
ADS.doc: The name of this Splitter. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
ADS.name: name

AIF.caption: Wallet 3
AIF.doc: Optional: The wallet address of the third recipient in this splitter.
AIF.name: wallet_3

AIG.caption: Wallet 4
AIG.doc: Optional: The wallet address of the forth recipient in this splitter.
AIG.name: wallet_4

AIH.caption: Wallet 5
AIH.doc: Optional: The wallet address of the fifth recipient in this splitter.
AIH.name: wallet_5

AII.caption: Percentage 3
AII.doc: Optional: The percentage of the splitter wallet 3 will receive, this is in basis points 1% is equal to 100 basis points.
AII.name: percentage_3

AIJ.caption: Percentage 4
AIJ.doc: Optional: The percentage of the splitter wallet 4 will receive, this is in basis points 1% is equal to 100 basis points.
AIJ.name: percentage_4

AIK.caption: Percentage 5
AIK.doc: Optional: The percentage of the splitter wallet 5 will receive, this is in basis points 1% is equal to 100 basis points.
AIK.name: percentage_5

AJC.caption: Description
AJC.default_val: This Splitter was deployed using The web3 toolbox created by JackMorgan.xyz
AJC.doc: The description of the splitter. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer.
AJC.name: description

AJD.caption: Image
AJD.doc: The image of the splitter. This will only be visible when viewing this splitter on a block explorer. This can be the value of a image uploader or an IPFS links formatted: ipfs://<CID>
AJD.name: image

AJb.caption: Important: The web3 toolbox takes a 1% cut of the splitter's total percentage amount. The total amount to be distributed between the recipients must be 99% (9900). The smart contract will fail to deploy unless the total sum percentage fields is 9900. If you only plan to use, for example, 3 wallets, make sure that field settings for recipients 4 and 5 are empty.
AJb.name: important
